A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Mashup of “Empire Strikes Back”\, “Return of the Jedi” in one. Also inserts of scenes from “Jurassic Park” - vibrating drink\, “Tron Legacy” - light cycles on salt and “Temple of Doom” - Tunnel effects. Even dialogue and scenes were poorly mimicked with a very weak story (if any) this is the worst ever edition. Episode 7 was “the new hope” rehash and this is the sequels. Looks like the ending is going to rehash the Anikin child story again from the prequels for episode 9! Finally looks like Ray is the incest child of Skywalker / Lelia which is pushing boundaries just too far in my opinion. This was such a massive disappointment.
